name: VHSMarker_Canine_Cardiac_Keypoint_CCK_Dataset
description: The CCK dataset is a meticulously curated collection of 21,465 annotated canine thoracic radiographs, capturing a diverse range of anatomical variations and clinical conditions. It is designed to improve the accuracy and generalizability of machine learning models for vertebral heart score (VHS) estimation.
citation: Veterinary AI Research Group. (2025). VHSMarker Canine Cardiac Keypoint Dataset [Unpublished dataset]. Available: https://huggingface.co/datasets/gen-ai-researcher/vhs_dogheart_db

hasPart.name: Train_Set
hasPart.description: Training set of canine cardiac X-ray images and their corresponding .mat labels.

hasPart.name: Validation_Set
hasPart.description: Validation set of canine cardiac X-ray images and their corresponding .mat labels.

hasPart.name: Test_Set
hasPart.description: Test set of canine cardiac X-ray images and their corresponding .mat labels.
